title: A New Approach to Two-Site HA Failover With K8s and Kubevirt
author: Kevin Reeuwijk
description: A look at simpler technologies that can deliver the same benefits of a two-site high-availability solution on bare metal Kubernetes built for smaller deployments.
cntitle: 基于K8s和Kubevirt的双站点高可用故障转移新方法
cndescription: 针对小型部署，探讨可在裸金属 Kubernetes 上实现与双站点高可用性解决方案相同优势的更简单技术。
